tax exempt.translation[0].definitions[0]: if savings, income etc are tax exempt, you do not have to pay tax on them
tax exempt.translation[1].definitions[0]: an investment on which you do not have to pay tax
There is strong investor demand for tax-exempts.
tax exempt.translation[2].definitions[0]: tax-exempt investments, savings, income etc are not taxed
tax exempt.translation[2].definitions[1]: an organization that is tax-exempt does not have to pay tax
Some hospitals risk losing their tax-exempt status.
